text: Dino Costantini (born 18 October 1940) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from the Province of Macerata
title: Dino Costantini
